review: This is a great accessory, the fact that I got it for free with a Sling TV coupon helps too! It works great and is very intuitive, I like that it comes with a remote too, and has an interface unlike the Chromecast (which I also own, and plan on returning). What the Chromecast has over this is ease of casting webpages. Since I currently work off a Mac, I can't use Miracast and so that knocks off a half of a star for me. The other half star is because sometimes I'll be watching Sling TV and it will shoot back to the home screen randomly, but it's rare. I would probably buy for $30, at full price the Chromecast still beats it. I would even buy this over Chromecast at $35.

review: Fire tv didn't work for me at first. After getting the HDCP unauthorized content disabled blue screen when trying to watch prime video I tried the list of fixes. Nothing worked until I found a work around. If you tv is a few years old you will probably have the same problem. If you plug the fire tv into a  ViewHD 2 Port 1x2 Powered HDMI Mini Splitter for 1080P & 3D it work with out a glitch. Once I used that HDMI splitter the firetv has worked flawlessly. If Amazon had alerted me prior to purchase that this was necessary for tvs even four years old I would've given the product 5 stars. A little more disclosure from Amazon would go along way in my book.
